e: 例⃝「`鎖定~`電視~`體育~`頻道~」、「`警方~`已~`鎖定~`嫌疑犯~`的~`身分~」。

Deutsch: fest einstellen, nicht wechseln ((节`目~`正在~进`行~`中~, 请`您~锁`定~频`道~`不要~`走~开))  (V)
English: to lock a computer file (to prevent it being overwritten)
to lock (denying access to a computer system or device or files, e.g. by password-protection)
